clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a Tool to Measure a Nurse's Individual Perception of Workload

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to validate the psychometrics of the Individual Workload Perception Scale (IWPS).

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study is to validate the psychometrics of the Individual Workload Perception Scale (IWPS) designed to measure the perception of individual workloads of inpatient registered nurses.
